record.id: field.name="db.copy" and file.name="formatctrl" and term=NULL and format.name="formatctrl.maint.dbopts.b" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: db.copy
record.file.name: formatctrl
record.format.name: formatctrl.maint.dbopts.b

brief.brief: Determines whether to save a copy of the primary table before making modifications.
This feature is only available on update and delete.
If the condition is true, Service Manager saves a copy of the primary table in the variable: $file0.

detail.detail: One example of a use for this feature might be to check if the operator has modified a certain field on the form.
You could set up a validation expression to compare the before and after variables and display an error if it has changed.
